text: Besaka unham lokam ne inakara kita jinham ne kiha ki alaha hi tam mari'ama da beta masiha hai. Akho, phira alaha de sahamane kihara adhikara rakhada hai. Jekara uha cahe ki mauta pradana kara deve masiha sara samaraja alaha de la'i hi hai. Akasa ate dharati ate jihara inham de vica vi hai (sabha alaha da hai) uha paida karada hai, jihara kujha cahuda hai ate alaha hara ciza di samaratha rakhada hai
